column4: I'm volunteering at an open source summer camp. but there's a guy i work with, with a really high pitched voice that's scaring me. What should I do??
i have to work with him. its so weird i never met anyone like that before. he has a beard but talks like a 5 year old
visualize him with pectoral accentuators and a dress and then the voice won't be so bothersome
